project1.name: React Guide
project1.description: This project is part of the full-stack web development course I participated in. I wanted to compile the knowledge I gained during the course and make it easily and efficiently accessible. The motivation was to create a tool that allows me and other users to access information about React. In this application, you will find component examples with their code, ready to be reused, and relevant information about their use and styling. I hope it is as helpful to you as it has been to me.

project2.name: Project Two
project2.description: A short description of Project Two, highlighting key features and tech stack.

project3.name: Project Three
project3.description: A brief overview of Project Three, explaining its main objectives and technologies used.

cta.message: You need help on your team?

education.aboutMessage: In 2023, I decided to face new professional challenges and explore new horizons. During an orientation course at DCI, I discovered the fascinating world of web development, which inspired me to pursue a career as a full-stack web developer. This path has allowed me to be creative again and tackle problems from innovative perspectives. Throughout the course, I have expanded my knowledge of building web applications, gaining a solid understanding of their technical requirements. Additionally, I was selected to be part of the DCI tutoring program, where I had the opportunity to support my classmates in their studies and projects. This experience not only allowed me to collaborate with exceptional people but also to learn from them and enhance my interpersonal skills. For more information about my journey, please see my CV.
